Package game.items.consumables

Class Runes

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
game.items.consumables.Runes
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, ConsumeAbility
public class Runes
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
implements ConsumeAbility
A class representing a Runes item that can be dropped by an actor. This item can be used to increase an actor's wallet balance.

  • Constructor Details

    • Runes

      public Runes​(int amount)
      Constructor to create a Rune. Initializes the name, display character, and portability of the item.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of money represented by the Runes.

  • Method Details

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor owner)
      Returns a list of allowable actions that the Runes can perform for the owner actor. It includes the ConsumeRunesAction to perform a wallet balance increase action on the actor.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
      Parameters:
      owner - The actor who owns the Runes.
      Returns:
      A list of allowable actions for the owner actor.

    • getCost

      public int getCost()
      Get the cost (value) of the Runes.
      Returns:
      The cost of the Runes.

    • consumeItem

      public java.lang.String consumeItem​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map)
      Represents the action of an actor consuming the Runes.
      Specified by:
      consumeItem in interface ConsumeAbility
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor that is consuming the Runes.
      map - the GameMap on which the action is performed.
      Returns:
      a message or description of the consumption action.
